quizDescription: Test your knowledge of classic movies with this entertaining trivia quiz.

questions.question: Who played the role of Holly Golightly in the movie 'Breakfast at Tiffany's'?
questions.explanation: Audrey Hepburn portrayed the iconic character Holly Golightly in 'Breakfast at Tiffany's.'

questions.question: Which film is known for the famous line, 'You can't handle the truth!'?
questions.explanation: The line 'You can't handle the truth!' is from the movie 'A Few Good Men,' delivered by Jack Nicholson.

questions.question: Who directed the film 'E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial'?
questions.explanation: Steven Spielberg directed the beloved film 'E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial.'

questions.question: Which classic movie features the song 'My Heart Will Go On'?
questions.explanation: The song 'My Heart Will Go On' is famously associated with the movie 'Titanic.'

questions.question: Who played the role of Vito Corleone in 'The Godfather'?
questions.explanation: Marlon Brando portrayed the iconic character Vito Corleone in 'The Godfather.'
